<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|touch|><|shops|>Mrs Bird is always telling me not to touch things in shops. I wish I'd followed her advice. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|shower|><|bathroom|>I still give the shower a #hardstare when I go into the bathroom. #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|eat|><|undefined|>Mr Brown told Jonathan he can't have his cake and eat it. I hope he never says that about my morning buns and cocoa #elevenses
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|toothbrush|><|undefined|>I'm packing for Paris. Marmalade, guide book, toothbrush... have I forgotten anything?

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|channel|><|spending|>It's been a very busy day. I'm looking forward to spending the evening with the Browns, watching my first film on @Channel4 at 5:15pm.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|trains|><|history|>I'm going to see several steam trains this year I’ll ask Mr Gruber about their history during #elevenses tomorrow
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|flower|><|undefined|>I have just found an old flower press, under my bed, that is full of potential cards and gifts.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|everything|><|undefined|>I couldn't decided what I wanted for breakfast this morning so I had a bit of everything.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|plan|><|undefined|>I’m going to have a cup of tea and plan what I'm going to do tomorrow.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|frostbite|><|blues|>I hope Mr Brown doesn’t have frostbite because I’ve just heard Mrs Bird say he has the January blues #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|gap|><|baby|>Baby Gap are about to launch my new clothing range. My duffle coat has a gap when I forget to do up a toggle.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|banks|><|bankholiday|>I am looking forward to the extra long weekend but I'm not sure why it's just banks that have a holiday. #BankHoliday
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|wer|><|jasmine__f|>@jasmine__f10wer My Aunt Lucy who lives in the Home for Retired Bears in Lima @BearsHomeLima and my friend Mr Gruber #oshietepaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|butterflies|><|meant|>Mrs Bird asked if I had butterflies because of tomorrow's premiere. I said no, was I meant to? #BearOnTheSquare
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|challenged|><|video|>Jonathan and Judy have challenged me to count the oranges in this video. I've tried a #hardstare, but I still can't. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|spending|><|undefined|>I'm doffing my hat at the sun and looking forward to spending the day outside.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sparklers|><|bonfirenight|>I hope it stops raining soon otherwise my sparklers are going to go soggy. #BonfireNight
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|answer|><|undefined|>I had so many questions from my Japanese friends last week I’ve found time to answer a few more today #oshietepaddington @eigapaddington

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|spectacles|><|cloak|>I'm going to dress up as one of my favourite characters today. Mr Gruber has found some spectacles I can borrow and Mrs Bird has lent me a broom. I just need to find a cloak. #WorldBookDay
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|mementos|><|undefined|>I've added mementos from #Wimbledon2015 to my #scrapbook. I wish everyone else hadn’t been wearing a hat though.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pastuso|><|amirindahellcat|>@amirindahellcat My favourite memory is making marmalade with Uncle Pastuso and my Aunt Lucy. #AskPaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|learn|><|something|>I learn something new every day when I share my #elevenses with Mr Gruber. #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|surprises|><|undefined|>I hope I’ve never ever done everything, otherwise I wouldn’t have any surprises left...#elevenses
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|expressions|><|undefined|>I have several expressions which I keep for emergencies. My #hardstare is one of them. #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|answer|><|undefined|>Mrs Bird has reminded me @eigapaddington that I must go soon to meet Mr Gruber. I’ll just answer a few more questions #oshietepaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pottery|><|londoncraftweek|>It's @LondonCraftWeek and time for my pottery class with Mr Gruber. I’m looking forward to this.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|votepaddington|><|tv|>I hope my followers will #VotePaddington for their favourite BBC children's TV character of the 1970s
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sunflower|><|starts|>I only have time for a quick #elevenses today as I have to get home to plant my sunflower seeds before it starts raining again.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|remembers|><|player|>I hope Mr Brown remembers to get the DVD player fixed. There's only 2 weeks to go until my film #Paddington comes out
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|deliver|><|coins|>I'm on my way back to London now to paw deliver some coins to the shop at Paddington Station. #AllChangeAtPaddington #Paddington60
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|debut|><|undefined|>I am celebrating with an extra mug of cocoa because it's only one week until I make my film debut #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|suggestions|><|bake|>I'm trying to find something a little different to bake. Mrs Bird has said she'll help me if I can give her some suggestions. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|exams|><|undefined|>I've got my paws crossed for those starting their exams next week.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|clockchange|><|undefined|>Mrs Bird tells me that the clocks have changed. I'm not so sure as mine still looks exactly the same. #Paddington2 #ClockChange
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|weeks|><|undefined|>I can't believe that in four weeks time I'll be able to watch #Paddington2 at home with the Browns.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|map|><|visitlondon|>I've got my map and am off to start the @NSPCC @VisitLondon #PaddingtonTrail
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|decker|><|undefined|>I got to sit at the front of the double decker bus today, one of my favourite things to do in London.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|starbarca|><|manners|>@starbarca10 My Aunt Lucy taught me my manners. I always wear my hat so I can raise it when I meet someone. #oshietepaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|cooler|><|blanket|>I’m looking forward to having a blanket on my bed this evening as it’s a lot cooler.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|biscuit|><|undefined|>I heard Mrs. Bird say Mr. Curry takes the biscuit, so I’ve made sure these aren’t going anywhere #hardstare
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|raise|><|bakers|>I raise my hat to all of tonight's bakers. #Paddington2 #GBBOFinal
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|boots|><|undefined|>Leaving 32 Windsor Gardens for my #elevenses with Wellington boots on and a #hardstare at the rain. I'm late as I couldn't find my boots.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|windows|><|undefined|>Have been doing my scrapbook. I’m looking forward to seeing these windows again tomorrow.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|weekends|><|bankholidayweekend|>I look forward to bank holiday weekends as I get to spend an extra day with the whole family. #BankHolidayWeekend
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|parkpups|><|undefined|>@ParkPups Yes, I do. Emergencies are always happening to me. I'm that sort of a bear.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|reads|><|director|>My director, Mr King reads about the first time I met the Browns. It's a day I'll never forget #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|richmond|><|undefined|>I went to Richmond Park with the Browns today. There were more than a few eyes on my #EmergencySandwich.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|expressions|><|undefined|>I have several expressions which I keep for emergencies. My #hardstare is one of them. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|engvaus|><|undefined|>Mr Brown says he hopes to see some Australian ducks today. I'm going to the park to see if I can find some for him. #CWC19 #ENGvAUS
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|clocksgoback|><|hour|>I'm not looking forward to when the #ClocksGoBack tonight because I have to wait an extra hour for breakfast, lunch and tea tomorrow.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|decorate|><|undefined|>I decided to decorate my room as a surprise for the Browns. They are definitely going to be surprised.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pages|><|railwaymuseum|>I’m going to use up several pages in my #scrapbook with these photos from my week at @RailwayMuseum

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|paintbrushes|><|bottle|>I'm going to start my Christmas list this afternoon. Mrs Brown, paintbrushes, Mrs Bird, a bottle, Mr Brown? Oh dear. #BarbourChristmas

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pilot|><|magician|>I believe I can be a dancer, a magician, a pilot or an astronaut. I just need to practice.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|soda|><|stpatricksday|>Mrs Bird said I should try soda bread with my marmalade sandwiches today to celebrate #StPatricksDay. It was a bit dry so I used two jars.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|engpan|><|undefined|>Mr Brown says the off-side rule is very simple. Judy says that it causes quite a few arguments. Mrs Brown says it’s only right if it helps her team. Mrs Bird asked me if I’d like another bun. #elevenses #ENGPAN
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|yuzu|><|chococookie|>@chococookie00 I liked the wagashi and o-cha that I had last week but my favourite would probably be yuzu marmalade #oshietepaddington

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|ways|><|undefined|>Brolly buster, real cloudburst, coming down in stair rods, raining cats and dogs... the English have forty-six ways of saying that it is raining. Now Jonathan, Judy and I have also got quite a few ways to say it’s hot.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|flag|><|wave|>Looking forward to tonight’s #EnglandvPeru match. It’s quite lucky I have two paws – one to wave the flag for England and the other for Peru

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|month|><|undefined|>November is an exciting month for many reasons, but mostly because of my new film #Paddington

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|wear|><|sunshine|>Enjoying my #elevenses in the sunshine this morning. Mr Gruber says it may even be too hot to wear my duffle coat this weekend.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|things|><|others|>Aunt Lucy says that the things we like about others, are often the things they like about us.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|nurses|><|doctors|>We’re all ready, at 32 Windsor Gardens, for 8pm to show our appreciation to the doctors, nurses and support crews, around the world, working to keep us all safe. #ClapForOurCarers

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|boxingday|><|undefined|>Judy gave me an extra present today for our family #BoxingDay walk. I'm not exactly sure what it is, but I hope it's a marmalade sandwich.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|blown|><|wind|>I've just been blown home by the wind. Mrs Bird was not too polite about my fur, she said it reminded her of another similar occasion.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|merry|><|presents|>I do hope everyone liked the presents I gave them. Merry Christmas.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|treats|><|heathrowairport|>.@HeathrowAirport I’m looking forward to it. Shall I bring sandwiches or will there be those lovely marmalade treats I had last time?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|land|><|air|>Enjoying #elevenses with Mr Gruber and he says spring is in the air. I hope it doesn't land on me. Glad I always wear my hat.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|eebaftas|><|undefined|>I'm very excited about tonight's #EEBAFTAs. The Browns and I will be watching it together at 32 Windsor Gardens as a family. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|share|><|undefined|>I’m a lucky bear to know so many people I can share marmalade sandwiches with every day.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|tall|><|bearcam|>I’ve invited Mr Gruber for ‘high tea’ - I do hope this tree will be tall enough. #bearcam
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|school|><|undefined|>I do enjoy my #elevenses with Mr Gruber, especially when Jonathan and Judy aren't at school so they can share it with me.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|york|><|undefined|>I enjoyed my week in York but it’s good to be back in London and sharing my #elevenses with Mr Gruber again
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|art|><|undefined|>Mrs Bird says there's an art to making perfect tea. I hope she likes my drawing of her recipe #TwelveDaysofElevenses
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|scenery|><|penrith|>I’m enjoying my #elevenses on the train to Penrith in Cumbria. I'm glad I have a window seat as the scenery is wonderful.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|occasion|><|undefined|>I'm so busy getting ready for Christmas that I've needed an #emergencysandwich on more than one occasion.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|salt|><|absorbed|>I love a good book. I was so absorbed in one this morning that to my surprise I found I’d put salt in my tea and sugar on my egg #elevenses
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|tomcruise|><|stunts|>I wonder if @TomCruise did all of his own stunts like I did? #MissionImpossible
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|emergencies|><|undefined|>I always keep a sandwich under my hat in case of emergencies. This one was very useful. #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sbliii|><|wins|>I don’t mind which team wins, I just enjoy watching a good game. #SBLIII
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|itunes|><|soundtrack|>Judy has discovered that the soundtrack to my movie is on @iTunes! I’ve been enjoying it with the Browns.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|knuckles|><|introduce|>I am most pleased to introduce my new friend, Mr Knuckles McGinty. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|chinesenewyear|><|events|>I'm pleased we're all different and that we don't all celebrate national events at the same time. #ChineseNewYear
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|decorations|><|undefined|>I'm using Mrs Brown's cake decorations to make something nice for us to eat during tonight's #GBBOFinal.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|news|><|undefined|>I have some very exciting news to share with Mr Gruber over our #elevenses this morning
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pictures|><|undefined|>Mr Gruber has started to take a few photos of our outings. I wonder if other people take pictures of their #BearsDayOut?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|fireworks|><|undefined|>I enjoyed our fireworks last night, especially when we went up to the attic to watch everyone else's across London.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|light|><|nap|>I'm pleased that the weather is getting colder because it means that we can light the fire earlier. It's a very good place to have a nap. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|uppies|><|teach|>We've all enjoyed watching the #WWC19 over the past month. I'm now off to the park so Judy can teach me how to do keepie-uppies.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sofa|><|dry|>I'm so pleased that there is a sofa in Mr Gruber's shop so we can take 5 minutes to dry off and enjoy our #elevenses.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|walls|><|stone|>I saw lots of stone walls in Cumbria. I wonder if Mr Brown would let me change our garden fence to one of these?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|summerbirthday|><|photograph|>Mrs Bird takes a very good photograph. My #summerbirthday cake before we all had a slice.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|invent|><|cookery|>Can you invent a new sandwich idea involving marmalade? If so you could win a copy of Paddington's Cookery Book

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|offence|><|mackenzie|>@aksmackenzie Dear Mr Mackenzie, I am sorry, I didn't mean to cause offence. But I think that Aunt Lucy, in the Home for Retired Bears, would have been quite excited. Apparently, the Peruvian football team are in a final for a large world cup.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pair|><|suppose|>Mr Brown told me I was getting too big for my boots this morning. I suppose I’ll need to buy a new pair soon then #elevenses

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|vase|><|mrs|>I know what Mrs Bird is giving Mrs Brown for Christmas. She told me to keep it under my hat but as it’s a vase I don’t think it will fit.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|starwars|><|undefined|>Jonathan has introduced me to the old #StarWars films. I can't think why he says that Chewbacca and I might get on.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sepicturehouse|><|undefined|>Judy says that I should go to @SEPicturehouse tomorrow to get some help with wrapping my Christmas presents. I think I'll have my #elevenses first and then go.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|rbkcmarkets|><|undefined|>@RBKCMarkets I'm getting my duffle coat cleaned especially for the event. I don't think I've ever been to a 150th birthday party before.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|turkey|><|undefined|>I've eaten so much turkey and Christmas pudding over the past two days I think I may just have cocoa for my #elevenses today
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|clowns|><|fromwhereistand|>I think I've already seen several clowns #fromwhereIstand #paddington

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|films|><|undefined|>One of my favourite things to do is watch films at home with the Browns. I think that this one will be particularly special to watch together. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|crunchy|><|saharadust|>I think the #SaharaDust has reached the Portobello Road because my #elevenses cocoa tastes very crunchy this morning.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|wedding|><|royal|>Mrs Bird is wondering if she needs to buy a new hat for the Royal Wedding next year. I think I'll keep my own.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|ravens|><|ticket|>I’ve got my V.I.B ticket. I think I’ll go and say hello to the ravens first. #PaddingtonsCoins
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|toss|><|charades|>Charades or a walk? I think the toss of a chocolate coin, or two, will help us decide.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|newyearseve|><|achieve|>Mrs Bird has just found her ‘Things to Achieve in 2018’ list. I don’t think we can do some of these in 12 hours and 51 minutes but we’re going to try. #NewYearsEve
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|louvre|><|visits|>Mr Gruber says it takes 100 hours to see everything in the Louvre. I think we may need a few more visits.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|puddle|><|fitting|>I didn't quite believe Mrs Brown when she said that we'd be visiting a place called Puddle Dock to see @hmvtweets. It does feel rather fitting though, as it's still coming down in stair-rods. #hmvPaddington2

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|wednesday|><|football|>I still haven’t seen it but Mr Brown says that we’ll definitely know by tea time if football is coming home. I wish he’d told me that on Wednesday as I’ve been waiting for quite a while now.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|plan|><|perfect|>Mrs Brown says that now is the perfect time to plan my next adventures. Where do you think I should go in 2018?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|jowhiley|><|butler|>@jowhiley do you think Mr Butler would like to borrow my Wellington boots to go with the umbrella you gave him?

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|country|><|undefined|>I've got my photos from our trip to the country. I wonder what other people have been sticking in their #scrapbook?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|knew|><|moment|>I knew I was going to like Mrs Brown from the moment we met. #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|chatty|><|alancarr|>I hope @AlanCarr Chatty Man will stop talking so that we can enjoy my new advert during his programme #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|veday|><|undefined|>I always enjoy my morning chats with Mr Gruber over our #elevenses. He has just told me why we are commemorating #VEDay70 today.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|outings|><|undefined|>I enjoy outings with Mr Gruber so this weekend we're returning to some of our favourite places in my #LondonGuide
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|warmer|><|undefined|>I'm pleased that the warmer weather has lasted so Mr Gruber and I can have #elevenses outside in our deckchairs.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|weekends|><|undefined|>I especially enjoy the weekends in London when I can spend time with the whole family and we can all go on adventures.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|tag|><|video|>Can you raise your hat as well as I can? Share a picture or video and you could win a special prize! Tag #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|gallery|><|secret|>Judy helped me put my #TwelveDaysOfElevenses scrapbook in a secret gallery - what will you be making today?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|vickimrobinson|><|certificate|>Hello @VickiMRobinson, my scrapbook is very important. The last thing I stuck in was my @MarmaladeAwards certificate #AskPaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|zacharyclark|><|undefined|>Hello @zacharyclark1, everyone laughed at the scene in the bath but I wasn't so keen as I got very wet and cold by the end #AskPaddington

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|spending|><|undefined|>I'm looking forward to spending another Christmas in London. We are decorating our tree today and Mrs Bird has made mince pies especially. I think I'll have marmalade with mine.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|wheels|><|cover|>I think I need a cover for my shopping basket on wheels. I can’t have wet buns for our #elevenses again.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|neighbour|><|imcmillan|>It sounds as though your neighbour is much nicer than ours @IMcMillan. I don't think Mr Curry would ever give me a jar of marmalade.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|djskyfall|><|undefined|>I was wondering what you’d think about it @DJSKYFALL69 . I am so pleased you liked it.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|snacks|><|ooh|>.@HeathrowAirport Ooh good. I may bring a few extra marmalade sandwiches in case your passengers eat all the snacks before I get there.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|stereokicks|><|invite|>I'm home at 32 Windsor Gardens @stereokicks but Judy says you're all very nice and that I should invite you round for #elevenses
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|milusefriedmann|><|tells|>@milusefriedmann Mr Brown tells me that my film should be with you on 30 November 2017. I hope you like it.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|happyfathersday|><|undefined|>I'm helping Mr Brown with some DIY and thinking of my Uncle Pastuzo today. Wishing you all a #HappyFathersDay.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|translate|><|undefined|>I’m happy to answer questions @eigapaddington but you might have to translate them for me as my Japanese isn’t very good. #oshietepaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|wave|><|outfit|>That’s very exciting Aunt Lucy. @BearsHomeLima You might see me in my new outfit. I’ll give you a special wave.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|safer|><|undefined|>@FamilyByCycle @itvanglia @LeTour @GraemeObree Dear Rhoda, most things I do tend to be a surprise. I'd like to meet you one day but it might be safer if I leave the bicycle riding to you. P.B.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|worldkindnessday|><|underneath|>Mrs Bird says you should always wear a smile. I'm not sure if it should be underneath or on top of my duffle coat. #WorldKindnessDay
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|woolandwaterltd|><|grow|>@WoolandWaterLtd Everyone is different so we can all fit in - you might grow to like marmalade. I hope you enjoy your #elevenses today.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|telegraphfood|><|undefined|>@TelegraphFood Would you like some help testing the recipes?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|saturday|><|night|>I'm looking forward to watching my first film again on Saturday night. Will you be making marmalade sandwiches for everyone @Film4?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|teams|><|rowed|>I think all the teams rowed very well so I'm going to celebrate with a slice of both. Happy Easter.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|bbcr|><|undefined|>I showed @BBCr4today one of my letters to Aunt Lucy - I think Mr @hughbon read it very well #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|bone|><|silver|>I thought I'd found a bone in my Christmas Pudding until Mrs Bird told me it was a lucky silver coin

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|wonka|><|toad|>@willtorrent @RylandPeters @MarmaladeAwards @CharlieChoc_UK @DalemainMansion @Fortnums @WorldBookDayUK @BBCBerkshire I think they look very nice indeed. I wonder what Mr Toad and Mr Wonka think.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|lady|><|millicent|>I thought Millicent was a nice lady when I first met her. #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|stays|><|undefined|>I don't think I'll be needing my duffle coat if the weather stays like this all weekend. #BankHolidayWeekend

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|butterflies|><|stomach|>Mrs Brown tells me that if it feels like there are butterflies in my stomach, it's time to sit down with a big mug of hot cocoa. I hope the butterflies won't mind. #gcseresultsday2018
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|camera|><|undefined|>I was pleased I remembered my camera today because I made a new friend. I think I'll add this to my scrapbook.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|return|><|smile|>I like to say 'good morning' to people I see on my walk, as I always get at least a smile in return. I think it's a nice way to start the day.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|maths|><|charts|>I think I’d enjoy maths as Jonathan said they did pie charts at school today. I wonder if they had custard on them?
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|lollies|><|undefined|>Ice cream, iced lollies, iced buns...I think I'm ready for the weekend.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|football|><|match|>I do hope Aunt Lucy was able to watch the match last night. I'm pleased Peru are doing so well at football. I think I'll have an extra slice of toast with marmalade this morning to celebrate.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sea|><|cameraman|>I wasn't there to film the sea life, just to clean windows, but I know how the cameraman feels. #BluePlanet2 #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|facilities|><|undefined|>This feels like a long time ago. I think I'm much better at using the facilities now. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|moment|><|undefined|>I’m enjoying coming home to this at the moment. I think it might be one of my favourite things at Christmas.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|walk|><|undefined|>I think I'm going to go on a nice long walk.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|rang|><|undefined|>Rang to tell the family I’d arrived safely. I don’t think Mr Brown was very pleased as he told me it’s 2am in London
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|family|><|undefined|>My family is very important to me. I think I'll put these into my scrapbook. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|hamleysparade|><|regent|>Regent Street seems quiet but tomorrow it's the #HamleysParade and I've been invited. I'm looking forward to it.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|marshmallows|><|kept|>Jonathan suggested I tried some marshmallows in my hot cocoa this morning. I thinks this should be kept for special Sunday #elevenses.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|simonfarnaby|><|mine|>I think @simonfarnaby’s hat looks almost as nice as mine. #BearOnTheSquare
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|upside|><|ullswater|>I’m not sure if it’s upside down or the right way up, but I think Mrs Brown will like this photo of Ullswater.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|snow|><|keen|>I wish it would snow in London again although I don’t think Mr Brown is quite so keen.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sturdier|><|undefined|>It's going to be raining cats and dogs today, according to Mrs Bird. I think I'm going to need something a little sturdier than my umbrella.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|doctor|><|undefined|>I was told that an apple a day keeps the doctor away but I think my daily #elevenses works for me.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|people|><|undefined|>People have been so nice about my film. I'm so pleased that everyone seems to like it. #Paddington2
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|january|><|mtoriofficial|>I think @MToriofficial will do a very good job when my film Paddington is released in Japan in January!
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|trendsetter|><|undefined|>I’ve read that I’m a trendsetter. I think it has something to do with duffle coats becoming popular all of a sudden.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|knapton|><|undefined|>I think Aunt Lucy would like to see the nice gentleman who designed my coin, so I've got a picture with Mr Knapton to send to her. I hope she likes it. #AllChangeAtPaddington #Paddington60
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|mrkiplingcakes|><|undefined|>@mrkiplingcakes That’s a very good idea Mr Kipling. I think I’ll take some cakes as well.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|presents|><|undefined|>I have just finished wrapping my presents for the Browns, Mrs Bird and Mr Gruber so I think it's time for some hot cocoa and a mince pie, or two.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|paddingtonrun|><|fast|>I'm pleased that this is just a game. I don't think I could run that fast. #PaddingtonRun
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|overheard|><|chicken|>I just overheard someone ask ‘What came first, the chicken or the egg?’ I think I may need two buns for my #elevenses to work that one out
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|thermal|><|undefined|>Duffle coat on. I've borrowed a pair of Mr Brown's thermal socks to keep my paws warm too. I think I'm ready to go to the bakers now. #Snow
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|teas|><|routine|>I'm a lucky bear to have enjoyed such delicious afternoon teas every day this week. I think I should add this to my daily routine. #AfternoonTeaWeek
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|judge|><|jars|>I’ve got to taste and judge all of these jars for the #MarmaladeAwards. I think I’m going to enjoy myself today!
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|iamradzi|><|cbbc|>#BluePeter has just started on @cbbc. I think I must be seeing things as @IamRadzi looks just like me.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|sweep|><|chimney|>The chimney sweep has been this afternoon. I think I should clear this up before the Browns get home.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|nationalcreamteaday|><|scones|>I think it’s important to join in special events so I’ve added scones to my shopping list #NationalCreamTeaDay
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pocket|><|suit|>Just arrived at the #EEBAFTAs. I feel very smart in my suit but I wish the marmalade sandwich pocket was bigger.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|malibu|><|undefined|>I thought I’d try surfing at Malibu Beach but I didn’t get on very well. Perhaps I should have taken off my duffle coat first.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|variety|><|performance|>I think I'd like to be part of next year's Royal Variety Performance. Maybe I could play the comb and paper.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|traffic|><|tfl|>I think I've found a good way to beat the traffic @TfL #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|george_ezra|><|feels|>I hear @george_ezra is under the weather. I know how he feels. I’m not sure I’ll ever need my duffle coat again #hardstare get well soon
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|pies|><|mince|>First, some marmalade on toast and then we're making mince pies. I think this is going to be a very good morning.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|buns|><|icy|>It feels more like we're having icy buns than iced buns with our #elevenses today. I hope summer isn't over yet.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|christmas|><|timings|>I think we're ready for Christmas. Presents are wrapped, labels have been written and Mr and Mrs Brown seem happy that their latest calculations of timings for the Christmas lunch are correct.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|recommends|><|undefined|>Golden weather and golden #WinterOlympics2018 calls for some special golden marmalade with our afternoon tea. Mrs Bird recommends that we have it on warm crumpets to celebrate. I think that sounds like a very good way to end the day.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|picnics|><|blanket|>I think that garden picnics in the rain are more fun than in the sunshine. We just need to make sure that the blanket is big enough to go under and over us.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|madzziiee|><|undefined|>Hello @Madzziiee and @sjoslinofficial! They play Judy and Jonathan in my new film, out this Friday #BearOnTheSquare
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|hello|><|sleepy|>Hello pyjamas, hello bed. Time to rest my sleepy head.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|mcginn|><|jackgmcginn|>@JackGMcGinn Dear Mr McGinn, I'm sorry I didn't mean to cause concern. It was a very nice walk and now time for a hot cocoa before bed. P.B.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|slight|><|key|>Sorry - slight issue with marmalade and the 'return' key - we're now good to go! Link's here:
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|question|><|dry|>Whilst I know rain is good, I do sometimes question if we need so much in one go? I hope we get some sunshine soon, if only to dry out my duffle coat.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|cherries|><|picked|>I hope we've all picked enough cherries to go into Mrs Bird's pies. Maybe I can try a few more.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|download|><|knows|>Mr Brown says you can now download my new film, #Paddington2. I'm not quite sure what he means, and I don't think he knows either, but hopefully Jonathan and Judy will be home from school soon and can help us.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|waitrose|><|undefined|>I think I am @Waitrose, I'll suggest it to Mr Gruber for our next #elevenses instead of iced buns - what do you think? #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|maggie|><|livpurvis|>@livpurvis Dear Ms Grace, please can you let Maggie know that #Paddington2 is on @BBCOne this evening at 6:25pm.
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|keithnieland|><|barrier|>Hello @KeithNieland, the helpful people @Tfl recognise me now and open the big barrier when they see me coming #AskPaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|uses|><|paulspud|>Hello Ben and Luke @paulspud, Mrs Bird uses Aunt Lucy's recipe so it's just as good and reminds me of Peru #AskPaddington

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|logiebear|><|undefined|>@logiebear98 I'm very pleased that you would like me to send you a reminder about my new film #Paddington2. I think I'll get a megaphone like Mr Curry's to remind everyone.

<|paddingtonbear|><|polite|><|linklateroliver|><|undefined|>@LinklaterOliver I'm very pleased that you would like me to send you a reminder about my new film #Paddington2. I suggest preparing some marmalade sandwiches for an extra special elevenses!

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|cream|><|jam|>Mrs Bird and Mrs Brown are wondering if the cream goes on the scone before the jam or after. To not seem rude I’ve put cream, then jam, then some more cream, just in case. #AfternoonTeaWeek
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|nationalscrabbleday|><|board|>Just for once I’m not in trouble for getting marmalade on the board #NationalScrabbleDay

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|grey|><|undefined|>Mrs Brown always says that every cloud has a silver lining, but the only ones I can see today are very grey.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|moment|><|undefined|>Life is so busy at the moment, I've had to start labelling my emergency sandwiches. #BearProblems
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|robbery|><|undefined|>Mr Brown has been muttering something about daylight robbery. However, it's dark outside and I haven't heard the burglar alarm.

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|diet|><|undefined|>They say we must eat a balanced diet so I'm having two buns for my #elevenses - one for each paw.

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|spices|><|undefined|>@KeisukeHoashi @HawkAndChick Mrs Bird guards her recipe for the mincemeat well but I know she puts in a mix of dried fruits, spices and sugar. We also add some orange peel which I like a lot. This has to cook in the oven surrounded by pastry to make the pie. They are especially good when they're still warm.

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|gloriousfood|><|farmavemaria|>@madammarj @MarmaladeAwards @farmavemaria @GloriousFood66 It looks delicious. It was definitely a #MarmaladeMonday. How many jars did you make?

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|snows|><|undefined|>I really hope that it snows this Christmas. I enjoy throwing snowballs with the Browns. #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|dark|><|undefined|>Before it gets too dark I'm going to take a walk through some fallen leaves and then back home for a mug of hot cocoa.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|spinelessclass|><|undefined|>Sadly I can’t enter but there’s a competition on my Facebook page to #win a @spinelessclass print of my first book
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|sad|><|cheer|>Mrs Bird was a bit sad about taking the Christmas tree down, so I made a mug of cocoa to cheer her up #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|cooking|><|work|>Now that Mrs. Bird has done all the hard work I'm ready to start cooking my #marmalade

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|versions|><|strike|>This very nice gentleman showed me how to strike some of the proof versions of my coin. Judy will be very impressed with all the new words I've learnt today. #AllChangeAtPaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|paw|><|undefined|>If I'm holding my mug of #elevenses cocoa with my right paw does that mean I'm holding my bun with the wrong paw?
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|gloves|><|undefined|>Mr Brown didn’t seem too pleased with the socks he got for Christmas but they make excellent gloves for a bear so I’m very pleased #freezing

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|andrewhochradel|><|postcard|>@Andrewhochradel I don't have to look hard to find something new and interesting in most things. Just cleaning under my bed this morning I found an old postcard from Aunt Lucy.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|holidays|><|undefined|>Bank holidays are all very well but now I’m confused which day of the week it is. At least I know it’s time for #elevenses.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|discover|><|undefined|>Very upset to discover it's already 7pm in New York so I missed out on three hours and my afternoon tea as well.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|vintage|><|undefined|>Miss Moss said she liked my hat very much, she asked if it was vintage and I said no it’s from Peru. #BearOnTheSquare
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|shake|><|oxford|>Ready to shake paws with my fans @Gap in Oxford Street. #Adventureawaits from 9-3pm
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|gifts|><|problem|>The problem with wrapping gifts straight away is that I forget what they are, so it's a nice surprise for everyone on Christmas Day.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|scratch|><|hamptoncourt|>Pleased that I'm feeling fine this morning. Mr. Gruber's just told me about a 'scratch choir' he saw yesterday at #HamptonCourt #elevenses
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|breakfast|><|undefined|>Sticky paws from enjoying a delicious marmalade #birthday sandwich for my breakfast
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|spoke|><|language|>@hachi3822 Japanese is a difficult language for a bear to understand, I'm glad @MToriofficial spoke it for me in my movie #oshietepaddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|shame|><|guild|>The Geographers' Guild is a lovely building. It was a shame I wasn't allowed to stay longer.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|quicker|><|boat|>Flying to London is a lot quicker than when I came by boat from Peru but I seem to have lost another five hours on the way.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|glow|><|fills|>Mrs Brown says that my movie soundtrack fills her with a warm glow on a cold day. Sounds just like cocoa #Paddington
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|screwdriver|><|undefined|>If I use Mr. Brown's screwdriver to press the keys it's easier than typing with paws. Now I don't type two letters together by mistake.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|fit|><|undefined|>These make very good marmalade sandwiches but I found it hard to fit one under my hat.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|fair|><|undefined|>We decided that it wasn't fair for Mrs Brown to lose an hour on #MothersDay so we've agreed to change the clocks tomorrow.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|spoil|><|undefined|>@JonnyDodge We have a pretty good idea but we would hate to spoil it for others! Paddington would give us a #hardstare if we did that!
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|cupboards|><|consult|>Not sure airing cupboards are the best place to hide Easter eggs. Will consult Mr Gruber about chocolate stains over our #elevenses
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|friend|><|undefined|>Mr Gruber is treating me to some sticky buns and marmalade sandwiches for our #elevenses. He's a very good friend to have.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|match|><|undefined|>After watching #Wimbledon this afternoon, we decided to play a match of our own. Mrs Bird is very good, but Mr Brown thinks she's cheating.

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|thick|><|stars|>Judy has made us some hot cocoa and we’ve found some thick winter coats so we can lie out in the garden and look at the stars. It's a nice way to spend a Friday evening....
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|lit|><|fire|>It’s a lovely day today but cold so Mr Brown has lit the fire so that we can all sit in front of it now we are back from our walk.
<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|deckchairs|><|undefined|>It won't be long before we can have our hot cocoa and sticky buns outside on our deckchairs again. #elevenses

<|paddingtonbear|><|impolite|><|kumailn|><|undefined|>@kumailn Mrs Bird suggests you try it on warm toast with melted butter initially. Then maybe move onto straight out of the jar, like me, in a couple of days time...
